text: Argyle is a village in Lafayette County, Wisconsin, United States. There were 783 people living in Argyle as of the year 2020. The village can be found inside the Town of Argyle. The United States Census Bureau says that the village has an area of 0.6 square miles (1.6 kmÂ²). ==References== ==Other websites== *The Village of Argyle, Wisconsin website Category:Villages in Wisconsin Category:Lafayette County, Wisconsin
title: Argyle, Wisconsin
